summary.para: The IP_UNIDIRECTIONAL_ADAPTER_ADDRESS structure stores the IPv4 addresses associated with a unidirectional adapter.

remarks.para: The IP_UNIDIRECTIONAL_ADAPTER_ADDRESS structure is retrieved by the function. A unidirectional adapter is an adapter that can receive IPv4 datagrams, but can't transmit them.

summary.para: The number of IPv4 addresses pointed to by the Address member.
An array of variables of type . Each element of the array specifies an IPv4 address associated with this unidirectional adapter.
